altcardups:Distraction.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Skills into your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

altcardups:Seek.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand.

altcardups:Armaments.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade !M! cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

altcardups:BodySlam.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal damage equal to your Block.

altcardups:SadisticNature.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, they take !M! damage.

altcardups:Flex.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose 1 Strength.
